item.title: Data Encryption using GPG!
item.author: Han
item.description: Securing Your Privacy The importance of securing your data has become critical in the modern digital era. This post explores a versatile tool called GnuPG, or GNU Privacy Guard, which allows you to encrypt your data and communications, ensuring that only the intended recipients can access them. A very naive approach to sharing encrypted files is to use the same secret key between a sender and a receiver.
